author: cutting
msg: AVRO-60.  Fix C JSON parser to correctly process escapes and multi-byte characters.  Add tests.  Contributed by Matt Massie.

author: markrmiller
msg: LUCENE-1725: Fix the example Sort algorithm - auto is now deprecated and no longer works with Benchmark. Benchmark will now throw an exception if you specify sort fields without a type. The example sort algorithm is now typed.

author: cutting
msg: AVRO-71.  Make C++ deserializer more generic.  Contributed by Scott Banachowski.

author: kmarsden
msg: DERBY-4155 (partial) Change XATestUtil.checkXATransactionView() to check result set as unordered to avoid intermittent testMorph failure.
